welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guelph/Eramosa, Canada! We are delighted to have you here and can't wait for you to experience our charming town known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. Get ready to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kitchener-Waterloo Regional Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, mainly serving international and some domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the 'YYZ Free WiFi' network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
